incidents.summary: West Midlands - Aston Bridge closed in both directions between Dartmouth Circus and the A5127 Lichfield Road junction, because of bridge maintenance work. Diversion in operation - via Thomas Street.

A4053 West Midlands - Slip roads closed on A4053 Ring Road in Coventry City Centre at J6 A429 Warwick Road, because of major roadworks. Diversion in operation - Signed diversions in place. The entry slip road into the railway station from J5 and the usual exit from the station via Manor Rd and round into Warwick Rd remains open, along with the exit slip road heading into the City Centre from Warwick Rd towards J7.
